metadata.title: CVE-2012-0808 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
as31 2.3.1-4 does not seed the random number generator and generatespredictable temporary file names, which makes it easier for local users tocreate or truncate files via a symlink attack.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-0808` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

as31 - 2.3.1-6
No subscription required

criterions.comment: as31 package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.3.1-6').
